alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 9:34AM EST until January 14 at 3:15PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise and Calhoun. .Recent heavy rainfall and snow melt will keep the Green River flooding until the end of the week, with Paradise and Calhoun cresting later today. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly agricultural bottomland and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 24.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
